home.welcome: Touch the screen and enter the reservation number.
home.description: We will move your luggage to the gate corresponding to your reservation number.

reservationInput.title: Reservation Number
reservationInput.invalidLength: Invalid Length. Please say 3 letters followed by 3 numbers.

moveToGate.autoRestart:
Emergency stop.
To start moving, press the Resume Moving button.
moveToGate.homeRedirect: After the luggage is transported, it will be returned to the home screen.
